data.text:
Sara Guasch (21 November 1918 â€“ 1 June 2005) was a Chilean-born actress who spent much of her career working in Mexico.[1] She appeared in more than seventy films and television programmes. She is also known as Sara Guash.

The Hidden One (1956)

Asesinos, S.A. (1957)

Our Man in Casablanca (1966)

Bloom p.27

Bloom, Nicholas Dagen. Adventures Into Mexico: American Tourism Beyond the Border. Rowman & Littlefield, 2006.
